document.full_text: when pakistan lost u.s.-supplied surveillance planes in a taliban's raid on a naval base in karachi, its ability to guard its coastline and participate in western-led maritime counter-terrorism activities was weakened.
document.title: naval base attack weakens pakistan's counter-terror surveillance
lines_and_colors: when pakistan lost u.s.-supplied surveillance planes in a taliban's raid on a naval base in karachi, its ability to guard its coastline and participate in western-led maritime counter-terrorism activities was weakened.
